== Main Inclusion Report for link-grammar ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/l/link-grammar/, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Build dependency of abiword-plugins, In order for abiword to support grammar checking, It needs link-grammar at build time. Since Abiword is the only word processor with this capability on linux, it is important that it is available.
** 
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=link-grammar|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=link-grammar|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions higher than priority 'medium'.
** No showstopper <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:link-grammar|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>.
** Good <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/l/link-grammar.html|maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki>.
** Active <nowiki>[[http://www.link.cs.cmu.edu/link/|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.abisource.com/buglist.cgi?query_format=specific&order=relevance+desc&bug_status=__open__&product=link-grammar&content=|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
